scripts.install-all: npm install && cd source/site && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd .. && bundler install --quiet
scripts.dev: cd source && del Gemfile.lock >nul 2>&1 && start "AUTORELOAD: Jekyll" cmd /k "jekyll build -w" && start "MongoDB" cmd /k "cd server && npm run mongo" && cd site && cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run dev
scripts.test: npm run install-all && cd source/site && webpack -p --progress --colors --config ./webpack.config.js && cd .. && jekyll build
scripts.build: cd source/site && npm run build && cd .. && bundler install --quiet && cross-env NODE_ENV=production jekyll build
scripts.pull: git stash && git pull && npm run post-pull
scripts.post-pull: npm run install-all && npm run build && cd source/server && pm2 reload server.config.js
